attributes.action: Make it mandatory that the Prime Minister actually answers questions
attributes.additional_details: The Speaker should be empowered to insist that MP point scoring responses are not accepted.
attributes.background: The public has no confidence that the House Of Commons is anything more than a political playground for sitting MPs. There needs to be a much higher level of professioalism and sincerity in questions and subsequent responses

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and the Prime Minister is responsible for answers to questions.
